paragraph__1.content: Option '1' is a default style / layout

paragraph__2.content: This is used for setting the skin of your theme

font_type.label: Select Font Type
font_type.info: Where do I find Google Fonts? - (http://www.google.com/fonts)

font_name.info__1: (this option uses for Normal font and Google font)
font_name.info__2: Selecting a different font can affect the speed of your store. [Learn more about system fonts.](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/os/store-speed/improving-speed#fonts)

font_size.label: Font Size
font_size.info: Selecting a different font size can affect the accessibility of your store.

font_weight.label: Font Weight
font_weight.info: Selecting a different font weight can affect the accessibility of your store.

button.placeholder: Paste CSS Code for a button box shadow like: 0px 1px 1.8px 0.2px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.3)

header__13.info: With infinite scroll, collection page / search resuls page can automatically show products as the user scrolls down the page without compelling them to ask or wait for it.

header__14.info: Changing Browser Title Dynamically When User Changes Tab

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.info: The ideal size for a favicon is either 16x16 pixels or 32x32 pixels. If your favicon file is too large, then it will be reduced to 32x32 pixels when you upload it to Shopify.

wishlist.label: Wishlist Feature?
wishlist.info: A wish list allows shoppers to create personalized collections of products they want to buy and send them to their mail for future reference.

swatch.options__2: Advance Color (Use Image With PNG Format)
swatch.info: Input Option Name To Show Swatch Style

customization-option.info: Uncheck this if you don't want the captured information to be shown in the order summary on the checkout pages.

paragraph__1.content: Customization Options are used to collect customization information for an item added to the cart. This information can be collected from the buyer on the product page and quick view.

add_to_cart.info: Apply to product detail page and quick view popup

trust_image.info__1: Trust Image Product Page / Quick View

share.label__2: Social Share Buttons On Product Page / Quickview
share.label__3: Social Share Buttons On Article Page
share.info__1: If you include a link in social media posts, the page’s featured image will be shown as the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/online-store/images/showing-social-media-thumbnail-images).
share.info__2: A store title and description are included with the preview image. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/promoting-marketing/seo/adding-keywords#set-a-title-and-description-for-your-online-store).

header__15.info: You can show text such as 'More Sizes Available'

product_title.label__2: Show Swatch Name After Product Title?

product_quick_view.label__2: Show Product Quick View On Mobile / Tablet?

general.info__1: * Only avaiable for store has Shopify Payments. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)
general.info__2: Don't choose all 3 options at the same time or combine Shopify payment with others. Link [here](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/payments/shopify-payments/multi-currency/setup)

paragraph__1.content: Separate your currency codes with a space. Use the ISO 4217 3-letter currency code. Click [here](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php) for a complete list of currency codes. Example: CAD USD.

paragraph__2.content: * For this functionality to work in your shop, you are required to edit your money formats as per [these instructions](http://help.shopify.com/en/themes/customization/currencies) (“Do tell where the money is”).

search_product.label__2: Show "View all" Button If Collection Has More Products Than Shown?

general.info: When You Choose: Input Link For Button

An email address identifies an email box to which messages are delivered

paragraph__1.content: Shopify supports only CSS in the theme file.

1. Use [Growave app](https://growave.io/?ref=halo_themes) and get 30-day trial. [How to set up Growave?](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1ZSb39y-BlizHA4AxIiTvpoD2BzvqE3ltpjUjBVT26DE/edit?usp=sharing)

paragraph__2.content: 2. Use [loox app](https://loox.io/app/halothemes) and get 30-day trial. [How to set up Loox?](https://docs.google.com/document/d/168AUIxIHClZrhTGNk3eVg8eEF4ZiBa6heRDgTB1PZYU/edit?usp=sharing)

paragraph__3.content: 3. Use [PageFly](http://www.pagef.ly/02vc) - Build High-converting page without coding hassle. Start for Free. 24/7 Live Chat support. [How to integrate PageFly app?](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1txoEPuujGJXD7sDlat0WaJxsQIC2JC3KLnH1UoKuV-g/edit?usp=sharing)
